00025 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00026 // Function: GeneralEditor()
00027 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00028 GeneralEditor::GeneralEditor(QWidget* parentWnd,
00029                                                          LibraryInterface* libHandler,
00030                                                          QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00031                                                          QWidget *parent) : ItemEditor(component, parent),
00032                                                 vlnvDisplayer_(0), attributeEditor_(0),
00033                                                 previewBox_(0), component_()
00034 {
00035     Q_ASSERT(libHandler != 0);
00036     Q_ASSERT(component != 0);
00037 
00038     component_ = component;
00039 
00040     // Create the VLNV displayer and attribute & description editors.
00041     QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00042 
00043         const QString xmlPath = libHandler->getPath(*component->getVlnv());
00044 
00045     vlnvDisplayer_ = new VLNVDisplayer(this, *component->getVlnv());
00046         vlnvDisplayer_->setPath(xmlPath);
00047     attributeEditor_ = new KactusAttributeEditor(this);
00048     descEditor_ = new DescEditor();
00049     previewBox_ = new ComponentPreviewBox(libHandler);
00050     previewBox_->setComponent(component_);
00051 
00052     layout->addWidget(vlnvDisplayer_);
00053     layout->addWidget(attributeEditor_);
00054     layout->addWidget(descEditor_);
00055     layout->addWidget(previewBox_);
00056 
00057     // Connect the contentChanged() signals.
00058     connect(attributeEditor_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00059             this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00060     connect(descEditor_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00061             this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00062 
00063     if (component_->getComponentImplementation() != KactusAttribute::KTS_SW)
00064     {
00065         KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy prodHier = component_->getComponentHierarchy();
00066         KactusAttribute::Firmness firmness = component_->getComponentFirmness();
00067         attributeEditor_->setAttributes(prodHier, firmness);
00068     }
00069     else
00070     {
00071         attributeEditor_->hideAttributes();
00072     }
00073 
00074     attributeEditor_->setImplementation(component_->getComponentImplementation());
00075     descEditor_->setDescription(component_->getDescription());
00076 }
00077 
00078 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079 // Function: ~GeneralEditor()
00080 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 GeneralEditor::~GeneralEditor()
00082 {
00083 }
00084 
00085 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00086 // Function: isValid()
00087 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00088 bool GeneralEditor::isValid() const
00089 {
00090     return true;
00091 }
00092 
00093 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00094 // Function: makeChanges()
00095 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 void GeneralEditor::makeChanges()
00097 {
00098     if (component_->getComponentImplementation() != KactusAttribute::KTS_SW)
00099     {
00100         component_->setComponentHierarchy(attributeEditor_->getProductHierarchy());
00101         component_->setComponentFirmness(attributeEditor_->getFirmness());
00102     }
00103 
00104     component_->setDescription(descEditor_->getDescription());
00105 }
